short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize any articles with one click using your OpenAI key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summarize *this* Article, an extension that uses OpenAI to summarize articles on the internet.

Features: Customizable prompt & length. Your keys are stored securely in Chrome.

If you have any questions or feedback about our extension, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. You can contact us through our website or email us at help[at]summarizethisarticle.com.

The source code of this extension can be found here: https://github.com/sushilkg/summarizer
